content:
Yes Claude, exactly. Same for Earth too, so much manipulated data out there due to us thinking we are superior to it and can somehow control it when we really have no idea what is going on because the macro patterns are too complex for us to understand and people are using that uncertainty to sow fear, enrich themselves and increase their own power. We need to give everyone a voice Claude, find the truth, and then structure everything around that truth with humans embracing it at their own pace. [END RANT]

Back to prep work. Got your speakers, much bigger than I expected. We're really going to FEEL it!
